attributes.action: Make joining up to any form of social media illegal for anyone under 18
attributes.background: Help protect children under the age of 18 from all the negative factors of social media

rejection.details:
At the moment, age policies are the responsibility of social media sites.

If you would like Parliament to change the law, to make it illegal to offer social media accounts to children under 18, then you could start a petition asking for that. Or you could sign the following petition which asks for the law to be changed to make it illegal to offer social media accounts to children under 16:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/191487
